cause.description:
this cause is to stop the production and distribution of tobacco all over the world. If this cause would work it would save billions of lives everyday. It would stop many forms of cancer, heart disease, stroke, and many more diseases from killing people.
1. the distribution of tobacco must end immediately
2. billions of people are addicted
3. tobacco causes harmful diseases
4. ending the death and sickness of close relatives
cause.mission: stop the production and distribution of tobacco
cause.name: tobacco intolerance
